Section.Paragraph: of lexicon has been emphasized as a methodology of Computational Lexicology recently. We focus on the closed semantic constraint of the argument(s) of any verb concept by the noun concepts in a WordNet-like lexicon, which theoretically is related to Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD) at different levels. From the viewpoint of Dynamic Lexicon, WSD provides a way of automatic construction for the closed semantic constraints and also benefits from the semantic descriptions.
Keywords dynamic lexicon, evolution, WSD, WordNet-like lexicon, closed semantic constraint
